text: Ani jevha tyancyasamora amacya ayati vacalya jatata, jya agadi spasta aheta, tevha he loka, jyanna amacyajavala yenyavara visvasa nahi, ase mhanatata ki yacyakherija dusara kura'ana ani kinva yata kahi pherabadala karuna taka. Tumhi (sa.) Tyanna sanga ki mala yaca adhikara nahi ki apalyatarphe tyata kahi badala karava. Mi tara tyaceca anusarana karena je majhyajavala vahayidvare ale ahe. Jara mi apalya palanakartyaci avajna karena tara mi eka mothya divasacya siksa-yatanece bhaya rakhato
